mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.banji_types as banjiTypes ,a.kaoshi_uuid_number as kaoshiUuidNumber ,a.kaoshi_name as kaoshiName ,a.kaoshi_nian as kaoshiNian ,a.kaoshi_types as kaoshiTypes ,a.kaoshi_address as kaoshiAddress ,a.kaoshi_time as kaoshiTime ,a.kaoshi_content as kaoshiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.kemu_types as kemuTypes ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM kaoshi a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and a.kaoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.kaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiName},'%')
and a.kaoshi_nian like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiNian},'%')
and a.kaoshi_types = #{params.kaoshiTypes}
and a.kaoshi_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiAddress},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoshi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoshiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoshi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoshiTimeEnd})
and a.kaoshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.kemu_types = #{params.kemuTypes}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
